Computer Science and Media Technology Research subject Information Systems Digital Health Software Engineering eHealth Computer Sciences Interaction Design Design Presentation I am a telecom engineer with Phd in biomedical engineering. My specialisation is software engineering and hardware prototyping for healthcare and social good. I work as an Associate Professor in Comptuer Science at the Department of Computer Science and Media Technology.
